Title: Establishes the millionaire's tax and economic equity act of 2021
Summary: Establishes the millionaire's tax and economic equity act; extends the top state income tax rate to 11.82% for taxpayers whose New York taxable income is over $100,000,000 and establishes new brackets below such top rate.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the top state income tax rate, and establishing the millionaire's tax and economic equity act of 2021
